original_title: Hollywood star Christian Bale aboard SriLankan flight
original_body_lines: Hollywood star Christian Bale who portrayed Bruce Wayne / Batman in 'The Dark Knight' film trilogy was given a memorable Sri Lankan experience during a flight from Colombo to Male yesterday.
SriLankan Airlines said they welcomed legendary actor Christian Bale on UL 115 of April 3, 2023.
"It was our absolute pleasure to have presented him a memorable Sri Lankan experience on his journey. We anticipate welcoming him again soon," the airline said.
